reviewText:
I will never forget the first time I watched this DVD.  It was a time in my life where I was so broken, distraught and weary of life that I wanted to throw in the towel. Then I watched the Dvd and such power riveted through my being and I began to laugh. It helped me gain trust again.  It was encouraging to see that someone understood and to hear that it's ok to be where you're at and that you are loved in the midst of hell.

Each flute impacted my spirit in a different way and brought hope and new life. I'd never experienced anything like it in my life!
